articles.description: Jordan Henderson is delighted to be back in training and has challenged Liverpool to "pick up where they left off" when the season resumes.
articles.content:
Jordan Henderson is delighted to be back in training and has challenged Liverpool to "pick up where they left off" when the Premier League season resumes.
